name: Knock Knock (kymasis, ma9yam)
description:
K n o c k  ...  K n o c k Don't come in (Still incomplete / Only got the basics so far xd)

Knock Knock is a suspenseful RPG game that follows two siblings playing a seemingly fun game of "Knock and Run" (a.k.a Ding Dong Ditch). However, their enjoyment comes to an abrupt halt when they decide to play a trick on the neighbour their parents warned them about down the road,  and in that instance, they disappeared. 

Players must walk in the shoes of ??? as he wakes up alone in what seems to be an old dingy basement with a strong, unknown metallic smell. He must search for his sister and look for an escape before their neighbour realises their plan.

How to Play:

Movement: Arrow Keys  / WASD

Interact: Mouse Button
